output_list.criticism: The transferAndFreeze function allows the admin to freeze arbitrary user accounts, which can lead to asset theft. This vulnerability can be mitigated by implementing a proper access control mechanism.
The transferReward function allows attackers to steal arbitrary user's rewards. This vulnerability can be mitigated by implementing a proper access control mechanism.
The unlockReward function allows attackers to unlock arbitrary user's rewards. This vulnerability can be mitigated by implementing a proper access control mechanism.
The transferFrom function allows attackers to transfer arbitrary user's assets. This vulnerability can be mitigated by implementing a proper access control mechanism.
The sell function allows attackers to set the sellPrice to 0, causing asset theft. This vulnerability can be mitigated by implementing a proper overflow check.
